Plot: The movie is a coming-of-age drama about a boy growing up in Astoria, N.Y., during the 1980s. As his friends end up dead, on drugs or in prison, he comes to believe he has been saved from their fate by various so-called saints.
Title: A Guide to Recognizing Your Saints
Actors: Dianne Wiest, Robert Downey Jr., Shia LaBeouf, Melonie Diaz
tomatoConsensus: A Guide to Recognizing Your Saints is a lively, powerful coming-of-age tale with winning performances and sharp direction from first-timer Dito Montiel.
